DOC.brief_summary: This open-label ( physician healthy volunteer know medication administer ) , single-dose , 5-dosing period study characterize pharmacokinetics ( process oxycodone absorb , distribute , metabolize , eliminate body ) effect food pharmacokinetics oxycodone . The study take place approximately two half month consist three phase : screen visit determine eligibility study , 5-dosing period treatment phase , end-of-study visit .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study To Characterize The Pharmacokinetics And The Effects Of Food On Oxycodone In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject 18 55 year age ( inclusive ) Evidence history clinically significant disease ; History obstructive sleep apnea ; Positive urine drug test .
DOC.keyword: management acute chronic moderate severe pain
